headline.print_headline: 2 Apollo Global Partners Are Said to Be Leaving
headline.main: 2 Apollo Global Partners Are Said to Be Leaving

docs.snippet: The departures of partners from Apollo Global Management underscore the growing pains that Apollo is facing as it adjusts to life as a publicly traded company....
docs.abstract: The departures of partners from Apollo Global Management underscore the growing pains that Apollo is facing as it adjusts to life as a publicly traded company.

headline.main: The Six Banks Leading Alibaba's Giant I.P.O.

docs.snippet: Six firms were listed as Alibaba’s lead underwriters, listed mostly in alphabetical order. The I.P.O. could end up raising more than $20 billion....
docs.abstract: Six firms were listed as Alibaba’s lead underwriters, listed mostly in alphabetical order. The I.P.O. could end up raising more than $20 billion.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.print_headline: BOJ Minutes: Consumer Spending Resilient After Sales Tax Hike
headline.main: BOJ Minutes: Consumer Spending Resilient After Sales Tax Hike

docs.snippet: Bank of Japan board members agreed that consumer spending remains buoyant following an increase in the sales tax rate in April, due to a tight labour market and improving wages, minutes of the central bank's April 7-8 meeting showed on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bank of Japan board members agreed that consumer spending remains buoyant following an increase in the sales tax rate in April, due to a tight labour market and improving wages, minutes of the central bank's April 7-8 meeting showed on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Boehner to Face College Professor in US House Bid
headline.main: Boehner to Face College Professor in US House Bid

docs.snippet: House Speaker John Boehner defeated two tea party challengers Tuesday in his bid for a 13th term in Congress, brushing aside some GOP discontent over his leadership in Washington....
docs.lead_paragraph: House Speaker John Boehner defeated two tea party challengers Tuesday in his bid for a 13th term in Congress, brushing aside some GOP discontent over his leadership in Washington.

headline.print_headline: Probe Gets Three Murder Convictions Tossed Out in Brooklyn
headline.main: Probe Gets Three Murder Convictions Tossed Out in Brooklyn

docs.snippet: Three murder convictions from the 1980s that involved a retired police detective who has come under scrutiny were thrown out in Brooklyn Supreme Court on Tuesday at the request of the district attorney's office....
docs.lead_paragraph: Three murder convictions from the 1980s that involved a retired police detective who has come under scrutiny were thrown out in Brooklyn Supreme Court on Tuesday at the request of the district attorney's office.

headline.print_headline: Official at Housing Regulator Threatens Former Boss, Faces Charges
headline.main: Official at Housing Regulator Threatens Former Boss, Faces Charges

docs.snippet: An official at the agency that regulates mortgage fund distributors Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac allegedly threatened to kill its former acting head last week and is now facing felony charges, according to police and court documents....
docs.lead_paragraph: An official at the agency that regulates mortgage fund distributors Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac allegedly threatened to kill its former acting head last week and is now facing felony charges, according to police and court documents.

headline.print_headline: First U.S. MERS Patient to Be Isolated at Home After Discharge
headline.main: First U.S. MERS Patient to Be Isolated at Home After Discharge

docs.snippet: The first U.S. patient to test positive for the often deadly Middle East Respiratory Syndrome virus will remain isolated at home after he is released from an Indiana hospital, officials said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The first U.S. patient to test positive for the often deadly Middle East Respiratory Syndrome virus will remain isolated at home after he is released from an Indiana hospital, officials said on Tuesday.

headline.seo: ‘Llyn Foulkes One Man Band,’ a Documentary
headline.main: A Portrait of the Outsider Artist, Older and Still Unfiltered
headline.kicker: Movie Review | 'Llyn Foulkes One Man Band'

docs.snippet: Llyn Foulkes, now 79, comes across in this film as a mostly lovable, cranky and brilliant outsider with a chip on his shoulder about not getting his due....
docs.abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews Tamar Halpern and Chris Quilty documentary Llyn Foulkes One Man Band.
docs.lead_paragraph: Llyn Foulkes, now 79, comes across in this film as a mostly lovable, cranky and brilliant outsider with a chip on his shoulder about not getting his due.

headline.print_headline: FBI Agent Detained in Pakistan for Ammunition
headline.main: FBI Agent Detained in Pakistan for Ammunition

docs.snippet: A law enforcement official says an FBI agent has been detained in Pakistan after he was found to be in possession of ammunition while trying to board a domestic flight in the country....
docs.lead_paragraph: A law enforcement official says an FBI agent has been detained in Pakistan after he was found to be in possession of ammunition while trying to board a domestic flight in the country.

headline.print_headline: American Tells Harrowing Story at NY Terror Trial
headline.main: American Tells Harrowing Story at NY Terror Trial

docs.snippet: A Texas woman shot in the leg during a 1998 terrorist attack on tourists in Yemen told her harrowing story to a jury at the trial of an Egyptian cleric Tuesday, saying she didn't know whether she was about to be freed or killed when a kidnapper an...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Texas woman shot in the leg during a 1998 terrorist attack on tourists in Yemen told her harrowing story to a jury at the trial of an Egyptian cleric Tuesday, saying she didn't know whether she was about to be freed or killed when a kidnapper announced: "It's goodbye to you all!"
